WorkItem.ClosedComment: If this still a problem in the latest version please open a new issue.
WorkItem.Description:
I was using Rawr v2.3.9 (brilliant program!) and today was asked if I would like to download the update, which I did. However, when I try and load any of my characters from the armory I get the same error message for all of them, this is one error message in full:
 
Step Name: Get Character
Description: Rawr encountered an error retrieving the Character - chiffy@US-Nagrand from the armory
Object reference not set to an instance of an object.
   at Rawr.Armory.GetCharacter(CharacterRegion region, String realm, String name, String[]& itemsOnCharacter)
 
I can open up saved characters okay. Can you please advise what I'm doing wrong?
WorkItem.Summary: [LoadCharacter] Object reference not set to an instance of an object

Comments.Message: Thank you for listing the first character (via the error message). Can you list the other characters that you could not load from the armory?
With both the unreleased Debug code and with the released 2.3.10 zip I was able to load Chiffy.

I am experiencing the same issue. No issues connecting with all prior releases. Tried changing proxy settings from use IE, login, login default and login with specific domain information - same result on all attempts. 

Step Name: Get Character
Description: Rawr encountered an error retrieving the Character - Yoshku@US-Scarlet Crusade from the armory
Object reference not set to an instance of an object.
   at Rawr.Armory.GetCharacter(CharacterRegion region, String realm, String name, String[]& itemsOnCharacter)
Pokey, the character named Yoshku when looked at on the armory is giving an error that it cannot be displayed. That's probably your issue.
I've added some more messaging to this stuff so we can get a more accurate view of where a failure occurs in the armory load process.
